database

Class ConcreteAdapterDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.ConcreteAdapterDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdapterDB

    public class ConcreteAdapterDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdapterDB
    Provides the connection with the Database.
